ComicInfo.Summary:
The first meeting between Doc Noble and Gaia Noble, told from the perspective of a bystander who was a hostage that day.
Rusty Noble attacks a columnist who has been writing negative articles about the Noble family.
Race learns an important lesson from his father early in his career.
Zephyr is recognized in public by almost everybody in a coffee shop.
The first meeting between Frost and his step-brothers and step-sister doesn't go well.
Zephyr sets Liz up on a blind date.
The first meeting of Race Noble and Krennick as children.
A tabloid reporter fakes news stories about the Noble family.
